name: Open Incidents State-AU tab
description: The "Open Incidents State" widget displays currently active incidents excluding those resolved (6), closed (7), or canceled (8). It helps customers monitor ongoing issues, prioritize incident management, and enhance service responsiveness.

name: Open Tasks State-AU tab
description: The "Open Tasks State" widget displays active tasks, excluding those that are closed complete (3), closed incomplete (4), or canceled (7). It assists customers in monitoring pending tasks, ensuring focus on outstanding work and efficient task management.
subTitle: NULL

name: Incident SLA Status-AU tab

name: Overall Tasks-AU tab
description: The "Overall Tasks" widget displays all tasks across different types (incident, incident_task, sc_task, problem_task, change_task) created within a specified duration. It provides a comprehensive view of task creation, aiding in overall task management and performance tracking.

name: Update Due Incidents
description: This widget displays incidents due for an update, filtering active incidents not in states Resolved, Closed, or Cancelled, and last updated between specific dates and times. It helps customers ensure timely incident updates, improving incident tracking and resolution.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Open and Overdue Incident
description: This widget displays open and overdue incidents for resolution. It helps customers prioritize and manage incident resolution by highlighting incidents that are still active, overdue, or have breached SLAs, ensuring timely and efficient incident handling.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Open and Overdue Tasks
description: This widget displays open and overdue tasks. It helps customers prioritize and manage pending work by highlighting tasks that are still open or have missed their deadlines, ensuring timely completion and improved task management.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Source of Incidents
description: This widget displays the sources of incidents created in the last 7 days. It helps customers understand where incidents are originating, enabling them to address recurring issues and improve incident management processes by analyzing recent incident data.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Task SLA Status
description: This widget displays the count of task SLAs achieved vs. breached for resolution and response targets in the current month. It helps customers monitor SLA compliance, identify areas for improvement, and ensure timely service delivery by highlighting breached SLAs across all priorities.

name: Hop Count for Open Incidents
description: This widget displays the hop count for open incidents with 2-5 hops and those with more than 5 hops. It helps customers identify and address inefficiencies in incident management, enhancing resolution efficiency by highlighting incidents with frequent reassignments.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Hop Count for Open Tasks
description: This widget displays the hop count for open tasks, showing how often tasks are reassigned. It helps customers identify process inefficiencies, reduce task handling time, and improve workflow efficiency by providing insights into task reassignment frequency and patterns.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Trend for No. of Hops - Tasks
description: This widget displays the trend for the number of hops (task reassignments) over time. It helps customers identify inefficiencies in task handling, streamline workflows, and improve task resolution processes by providing insights into task reassignment patterns and bottlenecks.
subTitle: Current Status

description: The "Open P2 INC" widget displays the status of all active Priority 2 incidents, excluding Resolved, Closed, and Canceled states. It helps customers track significant issues in real-time, ensuring timely resolution and improved incident management.
subTitle: Current Status

name: VIP Open Tasks
description: The "VIP Open Tasks" widget shows the status of all active tasks for VIP users, excluding Closed Complete, Closed Incomplete, and Canceled states. It helps customers prioritize and manage important tasks for VIPs, ensuring high service levels for key users.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Open Incidents State
description: The "Open Incidents State" widget shows active incidents excluding those in Resolved, Closed, or Canceled states. It helps customers monitor and manage unresolved incidents, providing a clear view of ongoing issues that need attention.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Open Incidents Breakdown
description: The "Open Incidents Breakdown" widget provides a detailed view of active incidents excluding those in Resolved, Closed, or Canceled states. It helps customers analyze and categorize ongoing issues, enhancing incident management and resolution efforts.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Open Tasks Breakdown
description: The "Open Tasks Breakdown" widget shows active tasks excluding those in Closed Complete, Closed Incomplete, or Canceled states. It provides a detailed view of ongoing tasks by their status, helping customers effectively manage and prioritize task resolution.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Open P1 INC
description: The "Open P1 INC" widget displays the status of all active Priority 1 incidents excluding Resolved, Closed, and Canceled states. It helps customers track critical issues in real-time, ensuring prompt resolution and maintaining service quality.
subTitle: Current Status

name: VIP Open INC
description: The "VIP Open INC" widget shows the status of all active incidents reported by VIP users, excluding Resolved, Closed, and Canceled states. It allows customers to prioritize and address critical issues from key stakeholders promptly, ensuring high service standards for VIPs.
subTitle: Current Status

name: INC Awaiting Response
description: The "INC Awaiting Response" widget displays active incidents in the states New or Awaiting Info. It helps customers identify and manage incidents needing attention or additional information, ensuring timely responses and efficient incident resolution.
subTitle: Current Status

name: INC Pending Response
description: The "INC Pending Response > X Mins" widget shows active incidents in New or Awaiting Info states that have been open for more than 15 minutes. It helps customers track and address delays in incident responses, improving response times and resolution efficiency.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Open INC Total
description: The "Open INC Total" widget shows the total number of active incidents excluding those in Resolved, Closed, or Canceled states. It provides an overview of unresolved issues, helping customers monitor and manage incident volumes effectively.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Open Tasks Total
description: The "Open Tasks Total" widget shows the total number of active tasks excluding those in Closed Complete, Closed Incomplete, or Canceled states. It provides a clear view of ongoing tasks, helping customers manage workload and prioritize effectively.
subTitle: Current Status

name: P1 INC Elapsed Time > 50%
description: The "P1 INC Elapsed Time > 50%" widget displays active Priority 1 incidents where over 50% of the business hours have elapsed, excluding those in Cancelled, Completed, Resolved, Closed, or Canceled states. It helps customers identify and address critical incidents nearing time breaches, ensuring timely resolution.
subTitle: Current Status

name: P2 INC Elapsed Time > 50%
description: The "P2 INC Elapsed Time > 50%" widget shows active Priority 2 incidents where over 50% of the business hours have passed, excluding those in Cancelled, Completed, Resolved, Closed, or Canceled states. It helps customers track critical issues approaching time limits, ensuring prompt action.
subTitle: Current Status

name: P3 INC < 1 Day Remaining
description: The "P3 INC < 1 Day Remaining" widget displays active Priority 3 incidents with less than 1 day of remaining business time, excluding those in Resolved, Closed, or Canceled states. It helps customers focus on incidents nearing their deadlines, ensuring timely management and resolution.
subTitle: Current Status

name: P4 INC < 1 Day Remaining
description: The "P4 INC < 1 Day Remaining" widget shows active Priority 4 incidents with less than 1 day of remaining business time, excluding those in Resolved, Closed, or Canceled states. It helps customers manage lower-priority incidents nearing deadlines, ensuring timely attention and resolution.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Tasks < 1 Day Remaining
description: The "Tasks < 1 Day Remaining" widget displays tasks with less than 1 day of remaining business time. It helps customers prioritize tasks that are nearing their deadlines, ensuring timely completion and efficient task management.
subTitle: Current Status

name: Open Tasks By State
description: The "Open Tasks By State" widget displays active tasks excluding those in Closed Complete, Closed Incomplete, or Canceled states. It helps customers track and manage ongoing tasks by their current status, ensuring effective task oversight and timely completion.
subTitle: Current Status
